titleStmt.title: The petition of the lord maior, aldermen and commons of the city of London, in Common-Councell assembled. Presented to the Right Honorable House of Peeres, Iune 10th 1647. ; With their lordships answer to the same.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: "Die Iovis, Iunii 10. 1647. Ordered by the Lords Assembled in Parliament, that this Petition and Answer be forthwith Printed and Published. Ioh. Browne, Cleric. Parliamentor."
Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
